physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Hundreds of bright pink papules with central yellow hue distributed symmetrically over dorsal hands, elbows, shoulders, and thighs.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Serum triglycerides: 3159 mg/dL; total cholesterol: 902 mg/dL; LDL cholesterol: 164 mg/dL; HDL cholesterol: 22 mg/dL; blood glucose: 278 mg/dL; glycated hemoglobin: 12.0%; lipase: 72 U/L.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Skin biopsy showed extracellular deposition of lipid within the superficial dermis, diagnostic of eruptive xanthoma.
Patient was stabilized with treatment for diabetic ketoacidosis and hypertriglyceridemia.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in triglyceride levels from 3159 mg/dL to 866 mg/dL post-treatment.
